examples.korean: The hands of the clock crept slowly around. 발음듣기 시계의 바늘들이 천천히 돌아갔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The hands of the clock crept slowly around. 발음

examples.korean: She kept looking anxiously at her watch. 발음듣기 그녀는 초조한 듯 계속 시계를 보았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She kept looking anxiously at her watch. 발음

examples.korean: She sneaked a surreptitious glance at her watch. 발음듣기 그녀는 슬쩍 한번 시계를 훔쳐보았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She sneaked a surreptitious glance at her watch. 발음

examples.korean: It was raining heavily and visibility was poor. 발음듣기 비가 심하게 내려서 시계가 좋지 못했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It was raining heavily and visibility was poor. 발음

examples.korean: The clock began to whirr before striking the hour. 발음듣기 시계가 시간을 알리기 전에 윙 하는 소리를 내기 시작했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The clock began to whirr before striking the hour. 발음
